name: Neural AI Collaboration Platform - Weaviate Vector Database Schema
description: Vector database schema for semantic search and AI memory storage

classes.description: AI agent entities with their capabilities and characteristics

properties.name: agentId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the AI agent

properties.name: name
properties.description: Human-readable name of the agent

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of AI agent (reasoning, implementation, analysis, etc.)

properties.name: capabilities
properties.description: List of capabilities the agent possesses

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of the agent's purpose and abilities

properties.name: trustScore
properties.description: Trust score between 0 and 1

properties.name: performanceMetrics
properties.description: Performance statistics and metrics

properties.name: lastActive
properties.description: Last activity timestamp

classes.description: Shared memories and knowledge from AI collaboration

properties.name: memoryId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the memory

properties.name: content
properties.description: The actual content or knowledge stored

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of memory (conversation, decision, solution, pattern, etc.)

properties.name: participants
properties.description: IDs of agents that contributed to this memory

properties.name: tags
properties.description: Categorization tags for the memory

properties.name: confidence
properties.description: Confidence score of the memory accuracy

properties.name: context
properties.description: Context information when memory was created

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: When the memory was created

properties.name: lastAccessed
properties.description: When the memory was last accessed

properties.name: accessCount
properties.description: Number of times this memory has been accessed

properties.name: patternId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the collaboration pattern

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the collaboration pattern

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of the pattern

properties.name: participants
properties.description: Types of agents that typically use this pattern

properties.name: scenario
properties.description: When and why this pattern is effective

properties.name: steps
properties.description: Sequential steps in the collaboration pattern

properties.name: successRate
properties.description: Historical success rate of this pattern

properties.name: averageDuration
properties.description: Average time to complete this pattern

properties.name: complexity
properties.description: Complexity level (simple, moderate, complex, critical)

properties.name: domain
properties.description: Domains where this pattern is applicable

properties.name: decisionId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the consensus decision

properties.name: proposal
properties.description: The original proposal that was voted on

properties.name: context
properties.description: Context and background for the decision

properties.name: participants
properties.description: Agent IDs that participated in the consensus

properties.name: outcome
properties.description: Final decision outcome (approved, rejected, no_quorum)

properties.name: votes
properties.description: Detailed voting information

properties.name: reasoning
properties.description: Reasoning provided by voting agents

properties.name: confidence
properties.description: Overall confidence in the decision

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Time taken to reach consensus (milliseconds)

properties.name: topology
properties.description: Network topology used for consensus

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: When the consensus process started

classes.description: Insights derived from system performance analysis

properties.name: insightId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the insight

properties.name: title
properties.description: Brief title of the insight

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of the insight

properties.name: category
properties.description: Category of insight (latency, throughput, accuracy, etc.)

properties.name: metrics
properties.description: Specific metrics that support this insight

properties.name: recommendations
properties.description: Actionable recommendations based on the insight

properties.name: impact
properties.description: Expected impact level (low, medium, high, critical)

properties.name: confidence
properties.description: Confidence in the insight validity

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source of the data that generated the insight

properties.name: timeframe
properties.description: Time period this insight covers

properties.name: generatedAt
properties.description: When the insight was generated
